channel.title: My Personal Website
channel.description: Recent content on My Personal Website

item.title: My First Post
item.description: I’m a fourth-year undergraduate at IIT Kharagpur, focused on building a deep understanding of how AI/ML meets large-scale software engineering. My work and interests lie in distributed systems, parallel programming for high-performance AI, and advanced domains such as NLP and reinforcement learning. Through this blog, I aim to share insights, experiments, and perspectives from my journey into building scalable and intelligent systems.

item.title: About Me
item.description: Hi, I’m Yaswanth. My interests span various areas of AI/ML, including Deep Learning, NLP, LLMs, and reinforcement learning. I am currently focused on developing a deeper understanding of low-level systems that enable scalable and efficient AI.
